name: Otherness
description: The way you see me as being different from you is determined by the fashion and mode in which you self-describe. It is not our differences that define us, but our similarities. Then why not love and support each other, as free beings seeking our souls, wanting to disentangle from the particularities of body, gender, colour, looks, religion and so on. I know only that I am part of this vast family of friends who seek the same as I do. This token serves only as a mere reminder of our shared human nature. Because after all, it is not our differences that define us but our similarities.
